metadata.title: Lennin Ibarra | Senior Frontend Engineer
metadata.description: Professional portfolio of Lennin Ibarra, Senior Frontend Engineer with over 10 years of web development experience

hero.name: Lennin Ibarra
hero.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building exceptional digital experiences with over 10 years of passion for code

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a passionate frontend developer with over a decade of experience building modern and scalable web applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and frontend architectures that prioritize user experience and performance.

monks.description: Led the refactoring of DITU video player for Caracol TV, transforming a monolithic component into a scalable modular architecture.

hoitsu.description: Developed web application for designing BPMN 2.0 diagrams with Next.js 16 and React 19, integrating interactive visual editor and real-time GraphQL communication.

comfama.description: Led frontend architecture with GatsbyJS and React, designing reusable components and custom hooks. Integrated AI tools to boost productivity.

itglobers.description: Developed user interfaces for VTEX IO e-commerce platforms, implementing custom React components for high-traffic digital channels.

indra.description: Led refactoring of compras.tigo.com.co portal, implementing accessible dynamic forms and Google Calendar API integration.

cabildo.description: Designed and developed React web application for project management of indigenous organizations, with company creation, roles, document upload and automated reports.

parquesoft.description: Implemented technology solutions for government: citizen hotline #195, PQRS system and INFORMANDO citizen participation platform with geolocation.

university.description: Solid academic foundation in software engineering fundamentals, data structures, databases, and systems development. This university education provided me with the technical and methodological competencies necessary to tackle complex web development projects and lead multidisciplinary teams in demanding technological environments.

bpm.degree: Advanced Architect and Developer in BPM
bpm.description: Specialized certification in advanced business process management (BPM) architecture and development, enabling me to design and implement automated workflows under BPMN 2.0 standards. This training has been fundamental for optimizing organizational processes and creating efficient integrations between enterprise and government systems.

platzi.description: Intensive training program focused on modern web technologies and development best practices. This experience complemented my academic background with up-to-date knowledge in frontend frameworks, agile methodologies, and emerging trends in web development, keeping me at the forefront of the tech sector.

ditu.title: DITU - Streaming Platform
ditu.description: Streaming platform for Caracol TV developed at Media.Monks. Modern architecture with React and performance optimization for millions of users.

bpmn.title: BPMN Process Editor
bpmn.description: Visual business process editor for Hoitsu. Allows designing and automating workflows with intuitive drag & drop.

tigo.title: Tigo E-commerce
tigo.description: E-commerce platform for Tigo Colombia developed at Indra. Optimized purchase flows and integration with multiple payment gateways.

romancerelax.title: Romance Relax E-commerce
romancerelax.description: Online store developed with VTEX IO for IT Globers. Personalized shopping experience and high performance.

informando.title: Informando - Citizen Participation
informando.description: Citizen participation application developed for ParqueSoft Nariño. Allows citizens to report and track local issues.

pqrd.title: Government PQRD System
pqrd.description: Petitions, Complaints, Claims and Reports system for government entities. Complete management of the citizen service cycle.

monks.text: Lennin is an exceptional developer who always delivers high-quality code. His ability to solve complex problems and lead technical teams is outstanding.
monks.author: Tech Lead

hoitsu.text: His React expertise and attention to detail in user experience were fundamental to the success of our product.
hoitsu.author: Product Manager

itglobers.text: A committed professional who understands business needs and translates them into elegant technical solutions.
itglobers.author: CEO

cta.title: Ready to create something amazing?
cta.message: Do you have a challenging project in mind? I'm excited to connect with people and organizations looking to transform innovative ideas into high-impact digital solutions. With over 10 years specializing in Frontend development and leading projects in both public and private sectors, I'm ready to help you bring that technological vision to life.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's talk!
